subject: Fishing, Sport
Ice
Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: With an eye on an Olympic berth, competitors at the World Ice Fishing Championship had to submit to the same examinations as world-class sprinters and weight lifters.
snippet: With an eye on an Olympic berth, competitors at the World Ice Fishing Championship had to submit to the same examinations as world-class sprinters and weight lifters.
